common_0060_head_teacher_00:
Right then, dear Pokémon. Time to come out of
your Poké Balls.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0060_head_teacher_01:
We provide each student entering the academy
a Pokémon of their own.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0060_head_teacher_02:
I’ll ask you to choose which among these three
you’d like to have as your partner.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0060_head_teacher_10:
They’re all very good company. Why, they usually
refuse to even leave my side.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0060_head_teacher_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hmm. So it turns out they’re more interested in
you, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)], than\r
familiar\r
old me.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0060_head_teacher_04:
I do wish I could stay and see which one you’ll
choose, but I must be off to my next home visit...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0060_head_teacher_05:
I’ll be at the house just over there. Take your time
with your decision, then come find me once your\r
mind is made up.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0060_head_teacher_06: Now if you’ll excuse me. Until next we meet.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0060_mama_01: What a mannerly fellow that director of yours is![VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0060_mama_02:
These three are all lovely—but you need to
choose just one, right? Not an easy task![VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0060_mama_03:
Why not take this opportunity to walk about with
these little ones and get to know them?[VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0060_mama_04: I’m sure they have lots to teach you![VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0060_mama_05:
Oh! But before you go... I got you a little
something to celebrate your big day!\c
Take it with you if you’re going out on your own.[VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0060_mama_06:
It’s a brand-new phone!\c
According to the instructions, you can check the
map app by pressing the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Y Button[VAR COLOR(0000)].\c
It’ll help keep you from getting lost, so take
good care of your new gadget, OK?[VAR 0114(002B)]
common_0060_mama_07: Now off you go. Have fun![VAR 0114(002B)]
